name: 1970's French Strawberry Pie
author: buzzsau
summary: My mom used to make this for our family back in '72. I totally loved it then as I do now! Very quick and easy to make.  My mom used to make homemade crust but I always have trouble with mine and I recently found Keebler® ready made shortbread pie crusts!
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) prepared shortbread pie crust (such as Keebler®)
directions: Beat cream cheese and 1 tablespoon heavy cream together in a bowl
Spread into bottom of pie crust
Arrange about 2 cups quartered strawberries onto cream cheese layer
Mix 2 cups mashed strawberries, 1 cup sugar, and cornstarch in a saucepan; cook over medium heat until slightly reduced and thickened, about 10 minutes
Pour cooled strawberry mixture over strawberry layer in pie crust
Chill in refrigerator until set, 2 hours
Beat 1 cup heavy cream, 2 tablespoons sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl until light and fluffy, about 5 minutes
